product_name: Columbia Rebel Roamer Rain Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: The Columbia Rebel Roamer rain pants with a 30 in. inseam should be a staple in your pack or bag. They keep you dry when there's a sudden downpour. Rugged yet supple, waterproof, breathable Omni-Tech(R)/nylon laminate construction keeps you dry in all conditions; factory-sealed seams. Nylon taffeta lining adds light warmth. Wide elastic waistband with drawcord dials the fit. Rip-and-stick cuffs tabs let you adjust the pants to fit over your shoes or boots.
short_description: The Columbia Rebel Roamer rain pants with a 30 in. inseam should be a staple in your pack or bag. They keep you dry when there's a sudden downpour.
